attributes.action: Use whatever influence the PM has to instigate the sacking of the board of the FA in light of their poor performance in Euro 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Football is the game of the people. The FA must be accountable to the people and not just the clubs. Board members must take responsibility for their bad decisions and be replaced. A complete review of how the game is managed should be undertaken and new people brought on board.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
